title: PHPinsteadofKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPinsteadofKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<?php
trait message1 {
public function msgA() {
echo 
  "My favorite color is red. ";
}
public function msgB() 
  {
echo "My favorite number is 5. ";
}
}
trait message2 {
public function msgA() {
echo "My favorite color is blue. ";
}
public function 
  msgB() {
echo "My favorite number is 7. ";
}
}
class MyClass {
use message1, message2 {
message1::msgA insteadof message2;
message2::msgB 
  insteadof message1;
}
}
$obj = new MyClass();
$obj->msgA();
$obj->msgB();
?>

practice_exercises.solution:
<?php
trait message1 {
public function msgA() {
echo 
  "My favorite color is red. ";
}
public function msgB() 
  {
echo "My favorite number is 5. ";
}
}
trait message2 {
public function msgA() {
echo "My favorite color is blue. ";
}
public function 
  msgB() {
echo "My favorite number is 7. ";
}
}
class MyClass {
use message1, message2 {
message1::msgA insteadof message2;
message2::msgB 
  insteadof message1;
}
}
$obj = new MyClass();
$obj->msgA();
$obj->msgB();
?>

quiz.question: What is My favorite color?
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of My favorite color is 'red'.

quiz.question: What is My favorite number?
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of My favorite number is '5'.

summary: This tutorial covers PHPinsteadofKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPinsteadofKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPinsteadofKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
